sentences.sentence: "I can say for sure that no one else loves me more than you do in this world," stated Sophia tearfully.
sentences.translation: “我可以肯定地说，在这个世界上，没有人比你更爱我了。”索菲娅含泪说道。

sentences.sentence: I tearfully replied, "Sweetie, I'm really sorry for the way I acted today."
sentences.translation: 我哭着回答：“亲爱的，我对我今天的行为真的很抱歉。”
